# Welcome

This is the index vignette for the MultiConnector package. Use the links below to open the detailed analysis guides.

## Available Guides

- One-dimensional analysis: `vignette("One-Dimensional Functional Clustering Guide", package = "MultiConnector")`
- Two-dimensional analysis: `vignette("Two-Dimensional Functional Clustering Analysis", package = "MultiConnector")`

## How to view vignettes

If vignettes are not showing after installation, make sure you installed the package with vignettes built.

```r
# From a local checkout
# (build vignettes during install)
devtools::install_local(".", build_vignettes = TRUE)

# From GitHub
devtools::install_github("qBioTurin/MultiConnector", build_vignettes = TRUE)

# Or, inside the repo, build vignettes only
devtools::build_vignettes()

# Then browse
browseVignettes("MultiConnector")
# Or open by name
vignette("MultiConnector")
```

## Troubleshooting

- Ensure DESCRIPTION contains `VignetteBuilder: knitr` and Suggests `knitr, rmarkdown` (this package does).
- If you installed without vignettes, rebuild with `build_vignettes = TRUE` or run `devtools::build_vignettes()`.
- For binary installs (e.g., on some platforms), source vignettes may be omitted; install from source to include them.
